title: dhIm tana udAra (tillAnA)
sahitya:
dhIm tana udAra dhiranA nAdhru dhru
 dhimi kiTata takadhimita dhIm dhIm kiTata


anupallavi

  dhIm dhirana dhinAra dhinAra udara tana
taka dhIm jhanutatAm dhIm jhanutatAm jhanutatAm tadhingiNatom


caraNam    nanda nandana harE dayA sadhana mandahAsa vadanA kunda radanA Ananda
tundiya mukhAra vinda gOvinda jaya mukundA yaduttama
tAm tAm sa ga ma pa ma taka dhimita dhIm dhIm ni ri sa ni dha tadhingiNa tom
jhaNuta ma ga ma dhimita tadhingiNa tom tAm tadhingiNa tom thAm tadhingiNa tOm
